feature.label: Manifest YML Editor Feature for Tibco Businessworks
feature.description: Cloud Foundry Application Manifest Editor for TIBCO BusinessWorks is an open source plug-in for TIBCO BusinessStudio. It is designed to improve the DevOps experience for users developing BusinessWorks applications in TIBCO BusinessStudio and running them on a Cloud Foundry deployment environment. It provides below key features - Auto Generation of application manifest (manifest.yml) file in for a BusinessWorks application Visual Editor to visually update the manifest file Ability to export manifest.yml along with BusinessWorks application EAR file
